attributes.action: instruct the Inland Revenue to investigate undeclared capital gains relating to newly built property purchase
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has been common practice for property developers to discount sold property with "cashback" deals and similar arrangements. The price notified to the Land Registry does not reflect the discount.

When the purchaser then sells the property they can state the gross price (rather than net) and therefore avoid capital gains tax.

This petition requests the Prime Minister to instigate an investigation into this type of fraud.
